info.title: Food Delivery API
info.description: API for food delivery system including user, vendor, delivery agent, and analytics functionality

post.description: Retrieves vendors along with their menu items using filters. Uses POST to handle complex filter criteria.

example.message: All vendors with their menus retrieved successfully

get.summary: Get vendor by ID with menu

post.description: Retrieves all menu items for a specific vendor filtered by meal type (e.g., Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner)

400.description: Invalid request - missing vendorId or type

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or missing authentication token

404.description: Vendor not found or no meals available for specified type

post.summary: Generate bill for a table and update payment status
post.description: Completes the order for a specific table and generates the final bill with payment details.

400.description: Invalid request - missing table number or invalid payment status

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or missing authentication token

404.description: Table not found or no active order for the table

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid fields

404.description: Order not found for the given table
